summary: A young pathology med student suspects that the spirit of a dead cadaver in the hospital morgue where she works is killing off all those who handle or desecrate the body.
cast: Corri English|Marisa Petroro|Ben Livingston|Abner Genece|Derrick O'Connor|Scot Davis|Joshua Alba|Jay Jablonski|Reb Fleming|Anna Johnson|J.C. Cunningham|Terence Goodman|Rhett Willman|Dana Anquoe|Stefania Barr|Julio Bove|Mario DeAngelis|Susan Duerden|Christopher J. Stephenson|Jerry Tracy
keywords: looking at oneself in a mirror|medical|cadaver|medical student|medical school
title: Los que no descansan
